scripts.build:gen: jq -cr '.abi' out/ETHTransferProxy.sol/ETHTransferProxy.json | sed "s/.*/\\/\\/ WARNING this file is generated automatically by 'yarn build:gen'\\nexport const ETHTransferProxyABI = & as const;/" > src/abi.gen.ts
scripts.build:cjs: yarn clean:cjs && tsc --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --outDir ./dist/cjs --verbatimModuleSyntax false --sourceMap
scripts.build:ts: yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm && yarn build:types
scripts.build:all: yarn build:forge && yarn build:gen && yarn build:ts # we omit forge from standard 'yarn build' so that clients who only want eg. grpc service don't need to install forge to make a root `yarn build` succeed
scripts.build:dev: yarn build # NB eth-transfer-proxy has no dev build, but we include this so that the root build:dev task works for all packages
scripts.build:prod-test: yarn build # NB eth-transfer-proxy has no prod-test build, but we include this so that the root build:prod-test task works for all packages
scripts.deploy:local: PRIVATE_KEY='' MNEMONIC='' forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --broadcast --fork-url http://localhost:8545
scripts.deploy:zora: forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --broadcast --chain-id 7777777 --rpc-url https://rpc.zora.energy --verify -vvv --verifier blockscout  --verifier-url https://explorer.zora.energy/api\?
scripts.deploy:mode: forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --broadcast --chain-id 34443 --rpc-url https://mainnet.mode.network --verify -vvv --verifier blockscout  --verifier-url https://modescan.io/api\?
